{"event":["create"],"email_to":"EcologyBidding@rskbiocensus.com","cc":"","bcc":"","from":"[sitename] <[admin_email]>","reply_to":"","email_subject":"New starter ([26]) added to Staff Portal","email_message":"

An entry on the Staff list on the Portal has been created for [26] on [created-at].

[22] is working for [27] as [34] and will be line managed by [813].

You can see their entry on the Staff Info list.

Please book them in for a bid writing training session within the next couple of weeks.

Thank you.
